name: PackageManager.queryIntentServices
author: Intika
description:
Use firebase (Block Google Firebase Cloud Messaging)
Description: Check main hook
Part: 15/15 (Optional)
luaScript:

-- You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
-- along with XPrivacyLua.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.

function after(hook, param)
    local list = param:getResult()
    if list == nil then
        return false
    end

    local filtered = false
    local name = hook:getName()

    local index
    local info = list:toArray()
    for index = info['length'], 1, -1 do
        local item = info[index]

        local pname
        if item == nil then
            pname = nil
        elseif name == 'PackageManager.getInstalledPackages' or
                name == 'PackageManager.getPackagesHoldingPermissions' or
                name == 'PackagieManager.getPreferredPackages' then
            -- PackageInfo
            pname = item.packageName
        elseif name == 'PackageManager.queryIntentActivities' or
                name == 'PackageManager.queryIntentActivityOptions' then
            -- ResolveInfo
            pname = item.activityInfo.packageName
        elseif name == 'PackageManager.queryIntentContentProviders' then
            -- ResolveInfo
            pname = item.providerInfo.packageName
        elseif name == 'PackageManager.queryIntentServices' then
            -- ResolveInfo
            pname = item.serviceInfo.packageName
        else
            pname = item.packageName
        end

        local target = 'com.google.android.gms'
        local starget = 'com.google.android.gsf'

        if pname ~= nil then
        if pname==target or pname==starget then
            -- our target
            filtered = true
            list:remove(index - 1)
        end
        end

    end

    return filtered

-- Possible system app filter with
-- applicationInfo.FLAG_SYSTEM (if set to int 1 mean the app is on the system partition)

-- Alternative implementation
--     local intent = param:getArgument(0)
--     local action = intent:getAction()
--     local target = 'com.google.android'
--     local starget = 'com.google.firebase'
--     if 
--string.sub(action,1,string.len(target))~=target and string.sub(action,1,string.len(starget))~=starget then
--        -- not our target
--         return false
--     else
--         param:setResult(nil)
--         return true
--     end
--

end
